name: Cultural
victoryScreenHeader:
Complete 5 policy branches and
build the Divine Sun God Temple to win!
victoryString: You have achieved victory through the awesome power of your Culture. Your team's greatness - the magnificence of its monuments and the power of its artists - have astounded the world! Poets will honor you as long as beauty brings gladness to a weary heart.
defeatString: You have been defeated. Your team has been overwhelmed by its many foes. But your allies do not despair, for they know that one day you shall return - and lead them forward to victory!

name: Domination
victoryScreenHeader:
Capture all enemy Capitals
to win!
victoryString: The territory has been convulsed by war. Many great and powerful teams have fallen, but you have survived - and emerged victorious! The game will long remember your glorious triumph!
defeatString: You have been defeated. Your team has been overwhelmed by its many foes. But your allies do not despair, for they know that one day you shall return - and lead them forward to victory!

name: Time
milestones: Have highest score after max turns
